definition: to wish/to express good wishes/to pray/(old) wizard
surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]

sentences.english: May Amma Bhagavan's blessing bring love and joy into your Relationships.
sentences.chinese: 願阿媽和巴格萬的祝福把愛和喜悅帶入你的關係之中。

sentences.english: Make sure your message is appropriate for each individual.
sentences.chinese: 確保你寫給每個人的祝福語是合適的。

sentences.english: This beatitude is as vast as the Bible itself.
sentences.chinese: 這個祝福，如同聖經本身一樣廣闊。
祝福無重數，全是我發出。

sentences.english: In keeping with tradition, the Pope then delivered Christmas greetings in 65 languages.
sentences.chinese: 根據傳統習俗，教皇使用65種語言表達了聖誕祝福。

sentences.english: Good tiding for Christmas and a happy new year!
sentences.chinese: 祂祝福你新年常常平安愉快。

sentences.english: Then bless the Earth Mother in return for the love she has given you.
sentences.chinese: 隨後在她給予你的愛中迴向祝福地球母親。

sentences.english: Blessed are those that can give without remembering.
sentences.chinese: 受祝福的是那些可以不記回報而付出的人。

sentences.english: Wrm greetings nd biggest wishes for the New Yer!
sentences.chinese: 致以猛烈的祝賀和良好的祝福，新年快樂。

sentences.english: This emerging awakening is a blessing from Source of All.
sentences.chinese: 這一浮現的覺醒是萬有之源的一份祝福。

sentences.english: He also blessed us that we would be able to remember our previous lives.
sentences.chinese: 他還祝福我們能記得過往的生世。

sentences.english: They will play a stage—show , wish all the people in snow .
sentences.chinese: 他們會上演一臺舞臺劇，祝福所有貯立雪中的人。

sentences.english: Abundant church-creation is a blessing and a curse for the house-church movement, too.
sentences.chinese: 對於家庭教會來說，大量組織湧現是祝福也是詛咒。

sentences.english: And when the king was come over, the king kissed Barzillai, and blessed him; and he returned unto his own place.
sentences.chinese: 王與巴西萊親嘴，爲他祝福，巴西萊就回本地去了。

definition: to wish/to express good wishes/to pray/(old) wizard
may you live a long and happy life together (wedding greeting)
give birth to a son soon (propitiatory compliment to the newly-weds)
to have all one's wishes (idiom)/best wishes/all the best/may all your hopes be fulfilled
to give one's respects/to send a greeting/(fig.) (coll.) to make offensive reference to (somebody dear to the person to whom one is speaking)
Get well soon!/to recover health quickly
